item.name: Rusty Sword
item.flavourtext: A sword that is covered in dark markings, presumably from uncleaned blood.

item.name: Blood-stained Scroll
item.flavourtext: It says "Dispose of the Alice of Red living within Claret Grove". (They failed it would seem)

item.name: Old Book
item.flavourtext: The binding is worn out, it's a miracle it's still held together. Who did it belong to?
